Maud & Ivy Flowers

 About Gallery Order

Order Request

Use this form to place an Order Request. Make your selections from the drop down options OR simply type your preference into the space provided. Complete all details and submit your request. I will review your request and respond to you with a Tax Invoice (Square POS) for payment prior to creation of your order. Add ons such as Cards, Vase, Delivery, Chocolates, Wine etc will be added to your budget. Delivery Fees are charged per suburb. Once you have reviewed and paid your Tax Invoice, your order will be fulfilled. Orders will be accepted on a first in first served basis.

Your Details.*

Recipient Details.*

Next Day Delivery or Collect*

We delivery Monday to Friday, Saturday by special request.

Payment Options:

Bank Transfer or Credit Card

Please note: our courier makes one attempt to deliver your items to the address supplied. Should the recipient not be available and a second attempt is required, you will be charged a second delivery fee. See full Terms and Conditions
